text: "Lies" / "Don't Drive My Car" is a 1980 double A-side from Status Quo. It was taken from their 13th studio album Just Supposin' and went to number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Ireland, number 9 in Austria and number 5 in the Netherlands. == Track listing == # "Lies" (Rossi/Frost) (3.56) # "Don't Drive My Car" (Parfitt/Bown) (4.12) ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Status Quo songs
title: Lies (Status Quo song)
